meanings.sent1: The ultratiny seed grew into a beautiful flower.
meanings.sent2: The ultratiny kitten fit perfectly in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent3: I found an ultratiny pebble in my shoe, making me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her ultratiny voice was barely audible over the loud music.
meanings.sent5: The ultratiny details in the painting amazed the art enthusiasts.

meanings.definition: Of a very small size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The ultratiny cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: She wore an ultratiny necklace that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The ultratiny raindrops felt like a gentle mist on my face.
meanings.sent4: His ultratiny savings grew slowly but steadily over time.
meanings.sent5: The ultratiny font on the menu was hard to read without glasses.
